name: Prototype: Wave Attack
description:
Small solo project I made in about a 2-week period and is a prototype build of what could turn into a larger wave-based game with a prototype level/experience system that directly works with an upgrade system. (No sound effects in this build).

Controls:

WASD - move.

Mouse to aim/ Mouse left click to shoot.

Q - drop weapon.

E - pick up weapon (only when a weapon is not equipped).

P - pause the game.

Tab - open the upgrade station (only when in front of the upgrade station).
